title: Athletism — Baseball (Elite) — Phase 1: GPP & Arm Care Base
equipment: Baseball field (batting cage, pitching mound, bases, gloves, bats, balls)
Radar gun, pitching nets, tee, resistance cords
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, kettlebells
Plyo balls, weighted bats, medicine balls (2–6kg)
goal: Build aerobic base, restore movement, arm care foundation.

warmup: Throwing progression (band work, plyo ball series, easy tosses)
main: Strength: Back Squat 4x6, RDL 3x8, Split Squat 3x8/leg
Throwing drills: 30–40 easy tosses, band ER/IR 3x15

notes: Week 1: 2x Z2 30–40'. Week 2: +10% volume, controlled eccentrics.
